Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.2.1 Windows 64bit

Problem: CTD repeatedly when near Vessel named Minmus Ground Base or instantly when switching to it from a nearby vessel within render distance.

Mods installed:

 

[x] Science! (xScience v5.3b)
Alternate Resource Panel (AlternateResourcePanel v2.9.0.0)
B9 Aerospace Procedural Wings - Fork (B9-PWings-Fork 1:0.40.10)
Color Coded Canisters (ColorCodedCans 1.5.1)
Community Category Kit (CommunityCategoryKit 1.2.0)
Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack 0.6.3.0)
Community Tech Tree (CommunityTechTree 1:3.0.2)
Contract Configurator (ContractConfigurator 1.21.0)
Contract Pack: Bases and Stations (ContractConfigurator-KerbinSpaceStation 1:3.4.1)
Contract Pack: Clever Sats (ContractConfigurator-CleverSats 1.3.0.1)
Contract Pack: Field Research (ContractConfigurator-FieldResearch 1.2.0)
Contract Pack: Unmanned Contracts (ContractConfigurator-UnmannedContracts 0.3.27)
Contract Parser (ContractParser 5.0)

KW Rocketry Redux (KWRocketryRedux 3.0.24.1)
KW Rocketry Redux - Instant Power Response Configs (KWRocketryRedux-InstantPwr 3.0.24.1)
Modular Fuel Tanks (ModularFuelTanks 5.8.2)
Modular Rocket Systems LITE (ModularRocketSystemsLITE 1.13.1)
Module Manager (ModuleManager 2.7.5)
Near Future Construction (NearFutureConstruction 0.7.2)
Near Future Electrical (NearFutureElectrical 0.8.2)
Near Future Electrical Core (NearFutureElectrical-Core 0.8.2)
Near Future Solar (NearFutureSolar 0.7.1)
Near Future Solar Core (NearFutureSolar-Core 0.7.1)
Planet Wiki (PlanetWiki 4)
PlanetShine (PlanetShine 0.2.5.2)
PlanetShine - Default configuration (PlanetShine-Config-Default 0.2.5.2)
Procedural Fairings (ProceduralFairings v3.20)
Progress Parser (ProgressParser 6.0)
REPOSoftTech-KSP Utils (RSTKSPUtils V0.23.1.0)
SCANsat (SCANsat v16.11)
scatterer (Scatterer 2:v0.0256)
SETI-ProbeParts (SETI-ProbeParts 1.2.0.1)
SpacetuxSA (SpacetuxSA 0.3.12.1)
SpaceY Expanded (SpaceY-Expanded 1.3.1)
SpaceY Heavy Lifters (SpaceY-Lifters 1.15)
Stock Visual Enhancements: Scatterer Configs (SVE-Scatterer-Config 2:1.1.4)
Stock Visual Enhancements: Sunflare (SVE-Sunflare 2:1.1.4)
Stock Visual Enhancements-Medium Res (SVE-MediumResolution 2:1.1.4)
TAC Fuel Balancer (TacFuelBalancer 2.11c)
TAC Life Support (TACLS) (TACLS v0.12.6)
TAC Life Support (TACLS) - stock config (TACLS-Config-Stock v0.12.6)
TextureReplacer (TextureReplacer v2.5.3)
Toolbar (Toolbar 1.7.13)
TweakScale - Rescale Everything! (TweakScale v2.3.2)
Universal Storage (UniversalStorage 1.2.1.1)
USI Core (USI-Core 0.3.4.0)
USI Kolonization Systems (MKS/OKS) (UKS 1:0.50.7.0)
USI Tools (USITools 0.8.6.0)
Waypoint Manager (WaypointManager 2.6.0)

Non-CKAN MODs:

Distant Object Enhancement v1.8.1

B9 Part Switch v1.5.2

MechJeb 2 v2.5.8.0

Near Future Propulsion v0.8.2

 

 

Reproduction steps:

Timed the while watching the console and it happens either exactly on switching to the Minmus Ground Base, or after about 5 minutes being near the fact.  The craft ONLY has parts from TAC Life Support/Mechjeb 2/Near Future Electrical/Kerbal Planetary Base Systems/Stock Parts.  

Log:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/idie0u6iww4hb14/output_log.txt?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/visanpatag1szeu/error.log?dl=0

Upon landing a vessel near another vessel I'm having a repeated crash to the desktop.  Have had very few CTD maybe 1 or 2 until the point of building a Minmus base.  The part count is fairly high but memory cap doesn't seem to be the issue.  The crash always occurs either exactly when I switch to the craft Minmus Ground Base from a nearby craft or when I'm within a couple meters of the craft with any other craft.  Also running the game in Windowed mode.  As I said have had no common crashes to this point.
